House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07895
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING THE ESTABLISHMENT OF FULLY-EQUIPPED SCIENCE LABORATORIES IN EVERY PUBLIC ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY SCHOOL AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to improve the quality of Science and Technology education in the country through adoption of modern methods of teaching Science and Technology (S&T) in elementary and high school and provide learners with laboratory equipment and facilities.
ALIAS NAME : “Science Laboratory for Basic Education Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : OLIVAREZ, ERIC L.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-02
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
